item.title: Authentication System Design Notes
item.description: Key Features: Users Register Users login Users sign-out To consider: Security User count Initial Problem: HTTP is stateless, but login is stateful (not having to login on every request).

item.title: first 2brain note
item.description: Hello world! pretty basic huh ? xD

item.title: Technical Diagrams
item.description: UML Diagrams Stands for Unified Modeling Language. Used to model software solutions, application structures, system behavior and business processes. UML Diagram Types Structure Diagrams: [[notes/Technical Diagrams#Class Diagram|Class Diagram]] Behavioral Diagrams: [[notes/Technical Diagrams#Activity Diagram|Activity Diagram]] [[#Sequence Diagram]] Class Diagram Used to represent a collection of classes.
